title: Running Shoes Red
description: Lightweight running shoes with breathable mesh upper and cushioned midsole for maximum comfort during workouts. Features anti-slip rubber outsole and reflective details for night safety.

title: Leather Boots Brown
description: Premium full-grain leather boots with Goodyear welt construction. Water-resistant finish, cushioned footbed, and durable rubber sole perfect for both urban and outdoor wear.

title: Casual Sneakers Blue
description: Versatile canvas sneakers with memory foam insoles. Casual design with reinforced stitching and flexible rubber sole suitable for all-day comfort.

title: Formal Shoes Black
description: Classic Oxford-style leather dress shoes with polished finish. Features leather lining, padded collar, and leather sole with subtle traction pattern.

title: Sandals White
description: Comfortable summer sandals with adjustable straps and cushioned footbed. Quick-dry materials and textured sole for secure footing.

title: High Heels Silver
description: Elegant evening heels with metallic silver finish. Features 3-inch heel with platform, padded insole, and secure ankle strap for comfortable wear.

title: Cotton T-Shirt White
description: 100% premium cotton crew neck t-shirt with regular fit. Pre-shrunk fabric, double-stitched seams, and ribbed neckline for durability and comfort.

title: Plaid Flannel Shirt
description: Warm flannel shirt with classic plaid pattern. Brushed interior for extra softness, button-front closure, and chest pocket. Perfect for casual or work settings.

title: Denim Button-Up Shirt
description: Medium-wash denim shirt with modern fit. Features pearl snap buttons, western-style yoke, and softened fabric for comfortable wear.

title: Silk Blouse Red
description: Luxurious 100% silk blouse with delicate draping. V-neck design with French seams and roll-tab sleeves for sophisticated office or evening wear.

title: Graphic Tee Black
description: Soft jersey t-shirt with screen-printed graphic design. Features tagless label, relaxed fit, and durable print that withstands multiple washes.

title: Dress Shirt Blue
description: Formal dress shirt in Egyptian cotton with non-iron technology. Features single needle stitching, split yoke, and French cuffs for business attire.

title: Smartphone X
description: Latest generation smartphone with 6.7-inch OLED display, triple camera system, and all-day battery life. Water-resistant, 5G capable, and featuring advanced AI photography.

title: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound, 12-hour battery life, and IPX7 waterproof rating. Connects to multiple devices simultaneously via Bluetooth 5.0.

title: USB-C Charging Cable
description: 6-foot nylon-braided USB-C to USB-A cable with reinforced connectors. Supports fast charging up to 3A and data transfer speeds up to 480 Mbps.

title: 4K Smart TV 55-inch
description: Ultra HD 4K Smart TV with HDR10+, built-in streaming apps, and voice control. Features quad-core processor, three HDMI ports, and Dolby Audio support.

title: Wireless Earbuds
description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, 8-hour battery life (24 with case), and IPX4 sweat resistance. Features touch controls and voice assistant support.

title: Gaming Mouse
description: RGB gaming mouse with 16,000 DPI optical sensor, six programmable buttons, and braided cable. Ergonomic design for right-handed users with adjustable weight system.

title: Laptop i7 16GB RAM
description: Professional laptop with 11th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB DDR4 RAM, 512GB SSD, and 15.6-inch Full HD display. Features Thunderbolt 4 ports and Windows 11 Pro.

title: Fitness Tracker Watch
description: Smart fitness watch with heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and 20+ sports modes. Water-resistant up to 50 meters with 7-day battery life and smartphone notifications.

title: External Hard Drive 2TB
description: Portable 2TB USB 3.0 hard drive with automatic backup software. Compact design, plug-and-play compatibility with Windows and Mac, and shock-resistant casing.

title: HDMI Cable 6ft
description: High-speed HDMI cable supporting 4K@60Hz, HDR, and Ethernet. Gold-plated connectors, triple shielding, and flexible PVC jacket for reliable connectivity.

title: DSLR Camera Canon
description: 24.2MP APS-C DSLR camera with DIGIC 8 processor, 45-point autofocus system, and 4K video recording. Includes 18-55mm kit lens and built-in Wi-Fi/Bluetooth.

title: Wireless Keyboard
description: Slim wireless keyboard with scissor-switch keys and 2.4GHz USB receiver. Features 12-month battery life, spill-resistant design, and adjustable tilt feet.

title: Running Shoes Black
description: Neutral running shoes with responsive cushioning and breathable engineered mesh. Features heel counter for stability and durable rubber outsole for various surfaces.

title: Work Boots Tan
description: Steel-toe work boots with oil-resistant outsole and electrical hazard protection. Features moisture-wicking lining, padded collar, and speed lace system.

title: Loafers Brown
description: Casual leather loafers with moc-toe design and flexible sole. Features genuine leather upper, cushioned footbed, and easy slip-on style.

title: Ballet Flats Pink
description: Soft leather ballet flats with elasticized topline for secure fit. Features memory foam insole, flexible rubber sole, and classic round toe design.

title: Hiking Boots Green
description: Waterproof hiking boots with Vibram outsole and Gore-Tex lining. Features ankle support, quick-lace system, and multi-directional lugs for traction.

title: Flip Flops Blue
description: Beach-ready flip flops with contoured footbed and textured sole. Features water-resistant materials and arch support for all-day comfort.

title: V-Neck T-Shirt Gray
description: Soft cotton-blend V-neck tee with modern fit. Features side seams, double-stitched sleeves, and colorfast dye that won't fade in wash.

title: Polo Shirt Navy
description: Performance polo shirt with moisture-wicking fabric and UV protection. Features three-button placket, ribbed collar, and side vents for active wear.

title: Oxford Shirt White
description: Classic Oxford cloth button-down shirt with button collar. Features barrel cuffs, back pleat, and mid-weight fabric that's perfect for layering.

title: Hawaiian Shirt Multi
description: Tropical print rayon shirt with camp collar and short sleeves. Features chest pockets, relaxed fit, and vibrant island-inspired patterns.

title: Sweatshirt Gray
description: Heavyweight fleece sweatshirt with kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs. Features crew neck design and soft, brushed interior for maximum comfort.

title: Hoodie Black
description: Premium cotton blend hoodie with adjustable drawstring hood and front pocket. Features ribbed hem and cuffs with reinforced stitching for durability.

title: Tablet 10-inch
description: 10.1-inch tablet with Full HD display, octa-core processor, and 64GB storage. Features dual cameras, all-day battery, and supports keyboard attachment.

title: Power Bank 10000mAh
description: Compact power bank with two USB outputs (2.4A total) and LED indicator. Can charge most smartphones 2-3 times and includes short charging cable.

title: Smart Watch Series 7
description: Advanced smartwatch with always-on retina display, ECG app, and blood oxygen monitoring. Features GPS, cellular option, and swim-proof design.

title: USB Flash Drive 64GB
description: USB 3.0 flash drive with retractable connector and 64GB capacity. Offers read speeds up to 100MB/s and includes secure encryption software.

title: Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Features plush memory foam ear cups, foldable design, and built-in microphone.

title: Portable Bluetooth Speaker Mini
description: Compact Bluetooth speaker with surprisingly powerful sound. Features 8-hour battery, built-in microphone for calls, and IP67 waterproof/dustproof rating.

title: Gaming Console PS5
description: Next-generation gaming console with ultra-high speed SSD, ray tracing support, and 4K gaming up to 120fps. Includes DualSense wireless controller.

title: E-Reader Kindle Paperwhite
description: Waterproof e-reader with 6.8-inch glare-free display and adjustable warm light. Stores thousands of books with weeks of battery life on single charge.

title: USB Hub 4-Port
description: Compact USB 3.0 hub with four ports and plug-and-play operation. Supports data transfer speeds up to 5Gbps and includes short USB cable.

title: Wireless Router
description: Wi-Fi 6 router with dual-band AX1800 speeds and coverage up to 1,500 sq ft. Features four gigabit Ethernet ports and easy setup via mobile app.

title: Running Shoes Gray
description: Everyday running shoes with cloud-like cushioning and breathable knit upper. Features reflective details and durable outsole for road and treadmill use.

title: Chinos Shirt Beige
description: Casual chambray shirt in neutral beige with button-down collar. Features chest pockets, button cuffs, and versatile styling for smart-casual occasions.

title: External SSD 1TB
description: Portable solid state drive with USB-C interface and read speeds up to 1050MB/s. Compact aluminum body with shock resistance and 3-year warranty.

title: Gaming Keyboard RGB
description: Mechanical gaming keyboard with customizable RGB backlighting and dedicated media controls. Features anti-ghosting, programmable macros, and wrist rest.
